data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Seoni
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Seoni, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 15,170 believers in Seoni against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Seoni, Madhya Pradesh, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 15,170 believers in Seoni, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Gond Mannewar people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Seoni who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 1,379,100 souls in Seoni and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the county of Seoni, Madhya Pradesh, India has a population of 1,379,100.

We estimate Seoni has 15,170 people who might know Jesus, 16,733 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,347,197 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Seoni, Madhya Pradesh, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.
